name: IRISS
tag_list: ir-windows, infrared-windows, electrical-safety, nfpa-70e, infrared-thermography, ultrasound-ports, ir-custom-application-products, ir, viewing-panes, sight-glasses
overview:
IRISS is the manufacturer of the world’s first and only industrial-grade infrared windows, IRISS’s end-user-designed products are the heart of efficient and safe work processes for infrared electrical surveys and thereby provide the means with which companies can reduce and eliminate the risk of arc flash to plant assets and personnel.

IRISS is a privately-held company whose mission is to enable companies to “save time, save money and save lives.” IRISS, Inc. corporate offices are located in Bradenton, Florida with additional offices located in Knoxville, Tennessee, Chelmsford, Essex, UK and Melbourne, Australia.

More information may be found at: www.iriss.com
